location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John P Parkin, Commander of HM Sloop Bacchus, Bushire Roads to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is requesting that the Resident informs the merchants of Bushire that HM Sloop Bacchuswill be leaving for Muscat and Bombay on 6 August 1817 and is offering protection to vessels travelling in the Gulf as well as the transportation of treasure.
